Vulnerabilities: Sensitive information disclosure through HTML comments

Steps.Description: Visit the website and inspect the HTML source code.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that there might be hidden information in the HTML source code.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker views the HTML source code of the website.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker discovers an HTML comment at the end of the home page.

Steps.Description: Visit the page 'https://codeiiest.github.io/d4rks0c1ety.html' and inspect the HTML source code.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that there might be hidden information in the HTML source code of this page as well.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker views the HTML source code of the 'd4rks0c1ety.html' page.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker discovers an HTML comment at the beginning of the page.

Steps.Description: Extract the flag from the discovered HTML comments.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker hypothesizes that the flag might be hidden within the discovered HTML comments.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker extracts the flag from the HTML comments.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker obtains the flag: accessdenied{1_w3nt_thr0ugh_th1s_w3bs1t3}
